errors.invalidUsername:
Username must:
• Be 6–20 characters long
• Start with a letter
• Only include letters, numbers, or specific special
 characters: dots (.), underscores (_), or hyphens (-)
errors.invalidAlias:
Alias must:
• Be 6–20 characters long
• Start with a letter
• Only include letters, numbers, or specific special
 characters: dots (.), underscores (_), or hyphens (-)
errors.invalidEmail:
Email must be in a valid format:
• Example: name@domain.com
errors.invalidPassword:
Password must:
• Be 8–32 characters long
• Include uppercase and lowercase letters
• Include at least one number
• Include at least one special character (@$!%*?&)
errors.invalidPIN:
PIN must:
• Be exactly 4 digits
• Numbers only (0–9)
errors.invalidTitle:
Title must:
• Be 1–32 characters long
• Letters and numbers only (no spaces or symbols)

about.title: About this project
about.text: P | N G - P · N G is our ft_transcendence project, developed as part of the 42 Network core curriculum. It’s a full-stack web application that combines real-time gameplay, and modern web technologies to deliver an engaging and competitive experience. This project showcases our skills in full-stack development, system design, and teamwork.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.text: For any questions, feedback, or to get in touch with the team behind this project, feel free to visit our profiles. We look forward to hearing from you!
